Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Calculator

  • public class Calculator
extends javafx.application.Application
    Calculator class represents a simple calculator which can do the basic arithmetic +,-,/,* in additon to the square root , square of a number and modulus operation . the calculator has an button for clear all expression and another one for clear one character of the expression. there an exit button to shutdown the application .
    Since:
    2016-03-25
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mohamed Talaat
